hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select count(*) as ds from core_role ta
select ta.ID_,ta.CID_,ta.CDATE_,ta.MID_,ta.MDATE_,ta.UUID_, ta.roleName,ta.roleDesc from core_role ta where ta.ID_ = :id
select count(*) as tmp from core_role where roleName = :roleName
select count(*) as tmp from core_role where roleName = :roleName and ID_ != :id
update core_role set MID_ = :mId, MDATE_ = sysdate(), roleName = :roleName, roleDesc = :roleDesc where ID_ = :id
select ifnull((select ta.ID_ from core_role ta where ta.roleName = :roleName),0) from dual
SELECT tc.ID_ FROM core_role_user_relation ta left join core_role tb on tb.ID_ = ta.roleId left join core_user tc on tc.ID_ = ta.userId where tb.roleName = :roleName order by tc.userName
SELECT tc.ID_ FROM core_role_user_relation ta left join core_role tb on tb.ID_ = ta.roleId left join core_user tc on tc.ID_ = ta.userId where tb.ID_ = :id order by tc.userName
